uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid
Class JHOVE2AnalysisControllerUtil

java.lang.Object
  uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.JHOVE2AnalysisControllerUtil

public class JHOVE2AnalysisControllerUtil
extends Object

Makes static utility methods out of some non-static classes from uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.AnalysisController to make it possible to cache both the configuration file and the signature file Some minor adaptations were made to those methods as required

Author:
smorrissey

writeXMLDate

public static String writeXMLDate(Date aDate)
Creates an XML format date yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss from a date object.

For example, 2005-02-24T12:35:23

Parameters:
aDate - Date to represent
Returns:
Date in formatyyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss (e.g. 2005-02-24T12:35:23)
